td.content: s:pt describes recurrent mild fatigue over the past month. The pt reports mild fever, mild cough. she is a white female numismatist aged 57 yrs. Denies ever using tobacco describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in her past o:Height 150 cm, Weight 46.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, HEENT: WNL, Pulm: effortless, all lung fields, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, and ordered PPD.
